name: Dead Prepper
description:
Dead Prepper 

[IN DEVELOPMENT]

Can you survive a month until the military arrives? Prep your runners as they venture into the dead world. Their survival depends on how accurately you pack their bags and your camp depends on the supplies they bring back. Failure is not an option.

How to play

  • A runner will approach you with a list of items he/she needs for their daily run.
  • Open the various menus to find these items, click, hold, and drag out of the menu to add the item to the backpack. Do this multiple times to add multiple of one item.
  • Open the backpack and click, hold, and drag out of the backpack to remove an item if you accidentally added it.
  • Once the timer is up, or you click "Check Bag", your accuracy will be checked and a new runner will approach.

Controls

  • Left mouse click to click buttons/open menus.
  • Left mouse click, hold, and drag to move items in and out of menus.

Planned features

  • Camp/colony stats such as 
    • week/days survived
    • population
    • supply count (food/drink, medicine, weapons)
  • Events affecting count of various supplies
  • Location of run determining the supply type brought back
    • The Supermarket -> food/drink
    • The Hospital -> provides medicine
    • The Armory -> weapons
  • Runners returning at night, bringing supplies which will increase chance of camp attracting survivors.
  • Runners bringing supplies (or even returning at all) determined by success rate of packed bag.
  • More items
  • Non-placeholder art/audio
  • Leaderboards for population count at end of in-game month.
  • Adjustments to main gameplay loop

Intended platforms

  • Google Play
  • itch.io

Intended Release

  • End of 2021
